ModMetaData.name: EscapeFromRim - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: SvenFire99
ModMetaData.description: A mod that adds in weapons and more from Escape from Tarkov (This is the dev version of EscapeFromRim. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
